game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: To retrieve the lost artifact and return it to the rightful owner
game.description: The town elder has lost a precious artifact that has been in his family for generations. It's your task to find it and return it to him
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a unique piece of armor

task.objective: Speak to Elder Mathias for more information about the lost artifact
task.description: The elder may have vital details that can help you in your search. Approach him with an open mind.

task.objective: Examine the mystical forest for the hidden artifact
task.description: The secret vault in the forest is said to be guarded. Be cautious and gather clues before venturing in.
